
-> This Application is Used for all those learners who are looking for very good resourceâ€™s to kickstart or  update or revise their technical knowledge.

-> The Resources which are provided in this application are collected through a comprehensive survey from large number of student community.

-> Steps for using/accessing the application
   	Step-1.Download the E-Learn Folder.
	Step-2. Open the E-Learn Folder.
	Step-3.select and Open the dist Folder.
	Step-4.Select and Open the main Folder.
	Step-5.A Huge Number of files is displayed after open the main folder. 
	Step-6.Find/Select  the main.exe file and open/run the application.
                             (or)
               Find/Select the main Application file and open/run the application.
